title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\AlertPolicy\Condition\LogMatch
name: LogMatch
description:
A condition type that checks whether a log message in the scoping project satisfies the given filter. Logs from other projects in the metrics scope are not evaluated.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.AlertPolicy.Condition.LogMatch

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.filter
params.description: Required. A logs-based filter. See Advanced Logs Queries for how this filter should be constructed.

params.name: data.label_extractors
params.description: Optional. A map from a label key to an extractor expression, which is used to extract the value for this label key. Each entry in this map is a specification for how data should be extracted from log entries that match filter. Each combination of extracted values is treated as a separate rule for the purposes of triggering notifications. Label keys and corresponding values can be used in notifications generated by this condition. Please see the documentation on logs-based metric valueExtractors for syntax and examples.

methods.description:
Required. A logs-based filter. See Advanced Logs Queries for how this filter should be constructed.
